questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided Video of the equipment.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar again.
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment.
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing Report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230.
shift the equipment to another place where AC Voltage of 230 is provided
check the continuity of power cord and confirm whether the power cord is defective
replace the power cord with a new one
open the equipment, check the continuity of ON / OFF switch and confirm whether it is defective.
replace the switch with a new one
check for any loose connection or breakage of cable from switch to fuse carrier board.
replace or reconnect the cable accordingly
check the continuity of fuses and confirm whether the fuses are defective
replace the fuses with a new one
check and confirm whether Input voltage to transformer is available
check for any loose connection or damage of cable
reconnect or replace the cable accordingly
check and confirm whether the output voltage is available at the transformer

videos.videoName: Video for checking the O/P Voltage

questions.question: replace the transformer with a new one
repair the Power supply board

videos.videoName: Video for replacing Power supply board

questions.question: check and confirm whether able to set the time of exposure but no exposure is taking place.
repair / replace the exposure switch assembly and confirm whether the problem still persist.

videos.videoName: Video for replacing exposure switch assembly

questions.question: NA
check whether able to hear the relay pick up sound after the equipment is ON and check whether 230 AC voltage is available at the Tube head assembly.
relay is defective, contact the technical team to repair the board
repair / replace the Tube head assembly accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the Tube Head Assembly

questions.question: check and confirm whether the exposure time is less than the applied exposure time.
Timer IC is defective on the power supply board, contact the technical team for repairing the board.
check whether some of the buttons or buttons do not respond while operating
open the equipment as shown in the video, check the continuity of switches and confirm whether the switches are defective.
replace the switches with a new one
check and confirm whether there is any loose connection of cable from power supply board to switch control board
reconnect the cable accordingly
repair / replace the switch control board

videos.videoName: Video for replacing switch control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON but the display is blank with no exposure time.
replace the display with a new one
If still the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other Assistance through video call.
Thanks
